name.japanese: オーシャンズドリーム島の森

description: A dense forest on Ocean's Dream Island where the Straw Hats travel on their way to the Palace of the Sea God. The forest becomes a battleground when Luffy encounters the hypnotized Zoro.

keyEvents.title: Journey Through the Forest
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats travel through this dense forest on their way to the Palace of the Sea God, with Robin leading as their guide.
keyEvents.significance: Serves as the setting for the crew's continued quest to recover their memories.

keyEvents.title: Entranced Zoro Appears
keyEvents.description: Zoro emerges from the forest depths under Noko's hypnotic control and confronts the crew.
keyEvents.significance: The forest becomes the site of conflict as the crew realizes Noko's powers extend beyond memory theft.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Entranced Zoro
keyEvents.description: Luffy battles the hypnotized Zoro in the forest while the rest of the crew continues toward their destination.
keyEvents.significance: The forest serves as the arena for one of the episode's major confrontations between crewmates.

statusHistory.reason: Location is accessible and traversed by the Straw Hats during the Ocean's Dream Arc

name.japanese: オーシャンズドリーム島の湖畔

description: A lakeside area on Ocean's Dream Island where the Straw Hats confront Noko and discover the truth about the memory theft. This location becomes the site of the climactic battle against the seahorse creature.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Drim
keyEvents.description: The crew apprehends Drim at the lakeside, confronting him about the memory theft.
keyEvents.significance: The lakeside becomes the location where the crew starts uncovering the truth.

keyEvents.title: Noko Revealed as True Culprit
keyEvents.description: At the lakeside, the crew discovers that Noko the seahorse has been the mastermind behind the memory theft all along.
keyEvents.significance: The lakeside serves as the location for the arc's major plot revelation.

keyEvents.title: Crew Confronts Noko
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats engage Noko in battle at the lakeside, fighting while avoiding his hypnotic gaze.
keyEvents.significance: The lakeside becomes the battleground for the episode's climactic confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Decisive Kick
keyEvents.description: Sanji delivers the decisive blow to Noko at the lakeside while the crew coordinates to avoid eye contact.
keyEvents.significance: The lakeside witnesses the turning point in the battle against Noko.

keyEvents.title: Memory Restoration Begins
keyEvents.description: After Sanji's attack, the crew begins recovering their stolen memories at the lakeside.
keyEvents.significance: The lakeside becomes the location of the crew's victory and recovery.

statusHistory.reason: Location debuts as the site of the confrontation with Noko
